author: {'steamid': '76561198086000429', 'num_games_owned': 394, 'num_reviews': 9595, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1692470934}
review: Aussie Sports VR 2016, oyuncularla tanışmak, hayranları görmek, tutkuyu hissetmek ve 2016'nın önemli etkinliklerinde seyirci olmak için sizi Avustralya'nın spor topluluğuna davet ediyor. Avustralya'nın en sevilen sporlarını keşfedin ve mini oyunlar oynayın: AFL, Basketbol, Kriket, Futbol ve Rugby .

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1627757477}
review:
Aussie Sports VR 2016 is a free VR experience about Australian sports.  It worked on my system, looked ok, played ok, sounded ok, was understandable.  Has five league sports that they play, with each sport there is some textual description, video, photo album, and a mini-game you can play.

Try it, if you like sports or Australia.
